Arrange topics based on number of views

Source: R/analytics.R
arrange_views.Rd

Arrange topics based on number of views

arrange_views(
  topics,
  by_theme = TRUE,
  by_date = c("month_year", "year", "all")
)

Arguments

topics

A tibble of topics by theme from en-net forum produced through a call to get_themes_topics().
by_theme

Logical. Should topics be grouped by theme? Default is TRUE.
by_date

Should topics be grouped by month of the year or just by year or overall? Default is to group by month of the year.

Value

A tibble of topic views by theme and by specified date format arranged in descending order

Author

Ernest Guevarra

Examples

library(magrittr)
ennet_topics %>% arrange_views()

#> # A tibble: 3,006 x 9
